entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
